author: Staff Reporter
text: Power supply will be suspended from 1 p.m. to 5 p.m. on Saturday, owing to maintenance works in Ottapidaram power sub-station. According to a statement from TANGEDCO here on Wednesday, the following areas will go without power: Ottapidaram, Osanoothu, Aaraikulam, Panchalankurichi, Vellaram, K. Subramaniapuram, Kurukkusalai, Puthiyamputhur, Sillanatham and Veerapandiapuram.
title: Power shutdown
